General.Name: Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells production process automation systems for the biological and pharmaceutical industries in China. It provides powder equipment, such as dust free crushing and pulse air mixing systems, automatic lifting hopper mixers, dust-free feeding stations, ton bag unloaders, vacuum conveying equipment, metering and packing machines, CIP cleaning units, and agent equipment-dry granulators; aseptic isolation equipment, including aseptic isolation and packing, sterile isolation batching, restricted access isolation, negative pressure isolation operating, and reactor isolation feeding systems; gas chloride sterilization equipment; and smart packing equipment. The company also offers pharmaceutical and chemical equipment comprising Chinese medicine extraction, evaporation concentration, purification and separation, fermentation preparation, distillation, and drying equipment; value products, such as diaphragm valve, globe valve, diaphragm globe valve, and other biomedical products; and professional medical pumps. The company's products are used in the pharmaceutical, chemical, food, additive, power, and other fields. Beijing Chieftain Control Engineering Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 27 Qingfeng West Road, Beijing, China, 102600
